title: Lamb cutlets with chicken mousse and sauce Choron
description: Welcome the spring with a fresh and impressive lamb dish flavoured with lots of fresh herbs.
ingredients: 1 tbsp each roughly chopped fresh chives, tarragon, parsley and mint
5 French-trimmed lamb chops, all visible fat removed
good splash rapeseed oil, for cooking
sea salt and freshly ground white pepper
small bunch fresh mint, finely chopped
3 tomatoes skinned, deseeded and finely diced
